gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤਾਤ ਮਾਤ ਗ੍ਹਿ ਜਨਮਤ ਸੁਤ ਘਨੇ ਸਕਲ ਨ ਹੋਤ ਸਮਸਰ ਗੁਨ ਗਥ ਜੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Taat Maat Grih Janamat Sout Ghanay , Sakal N Hot Samasar Goun Gad Jee ?
translation: Just as several sons are born to a parent, but all are not virtuous to the same extent.

gurmukhi: ਚਟੀਅਾ ਅਨੇਕ ਜੈਸੇ ਅਾਵੈਂ ਚਟਸਾਲ ਬਿਖੈ ਪੜਤ ਨ ੲੇਕਸੇ ਸਰਬ ਹਰ ਕਥ ਜੀ
transliteration: Chateeaa Anayk Jaisay Aavain Chatasaal Bikhai , Parhat N Aykasay Sarab Har Kad Jee ?
translation: Just as there are several students in a school, but all of them are not proficient in understanding a subject to the same extent.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਨਦੀ ਨਾਵ ਮਿਲਿ ਬੈਠਤ ਅਨੇਕ ਪੰਥੀ ਹੋਤ ਨ ਸਮਾਨ ਸਭੈ ਚਲਤ ਹੈਂ ਪਥ ਜੀ
transliteration: Jaisay Nadee Naav Mili Baitthat Anayk Pandee , Hot N Samaan Sabhai Chalat Hain Pad Jee ?
translation: Just as several passengers travel in a boat, but all of them have different destinations. Everyone goes his own way 00 leaving the boat.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰ ਚਰਨ ਸਰਨ ਹੈਂ ਅਨੇਕ ਸਿਖ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਕਰਨ ਕਾਰਨ ਸਮਰਥ ਜੀ ॥੫੮੩॥
transliteration: Taisay Gur Charan Saran Hain Anayk Sikha , Satigur Karan Kaaran Samarad Jee ?583?
translation: Similarly, several Sikhs of different aptitude take refuge of the True Guru, but the cause of all causes--the capable True Guru makes them alike by bestowing on them the elixir of Naam.  (583)
